text: Harold Methven (9 October 1908 – 1987) was an English professional footballer who played in the Football League for Mansfield Town and Portsmouth. ==References== Category:1908 births Category:1987 deaths Category:English footballers Category:Association football forwards Category:English Football League players Category:Gresley F.C. players Category:Portsmouth F.C. players Category:Sheffield United F.C. players Category:Scunthorpe United F.C. players Category:Loughborough Corinthians F.C. players Category:Mansfield Town F.C. players Category:Tunbridge Wells F.C. players
title: Harold Methven
